description: Object containing the details of the policy.

id.description: A unique identifier for this policy. System-generated if not provided.

name.description: A human-readable name/label for this policy. Required.

description.description: Free form description of the policy. Optional.

userPolicy.description: Object containing the details of the user-based policy

timePolicy.description: Object containing the details of the time-based policy.

rolePolicy.description: Object containing the details of the aggregated policy.
